mapper.select: SELECT seq, main, type, zipcode, address, contact_seq FROM contact_address WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY seq ASC
SELECT seq, address FROM contact_address WHERE 1=1 AND seq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contact_address ( main, type, zipcode, address, contact_seq ) VALUES ( #{main}, #{type}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{contact_seq} )
